title: News Briefs 11-01-2021
cleaned_text:
You keep using that word…
• The first sign of intelligent life beyond Earth?
• An astronomer who believes in aliens explains why he’s not convinced by UFO sightings.
• Solar power beamed down from space to Earth moves forward. Wait…technically, isn’t all solar power beamed from space to Earth?
• Scientists say Earth is spinning faster than it has in decades.
• Germany developed the first PCR test and the first Covid-19 vaccine. But it’s also a country where some hospitals claim to have halved the virus’ fatality rate by treating patients with iron harvested from shooting stars.
• Conspirituality: A closer look at the ‘QAnon shaman‘ leading the mob in the Capitol.
• The Twilight Zone has been flooded with shit: a call to think more carefully about fringe theories and history.
• Neuroscientists believe deep neural networks could help illustrate how psychedelics alter consciousness.
• Group looking for ‘haunted house’ discovers body in freezer.
• Treasure hunter charged for digging in Yellowstone cemetery while looking for Forrest Fenn prize.

Quote of the Day:

We tell stories all the time, and we use them to explain and to signal our various cultural ideologies, norms, beliefs, and values. People take real world action on these. A lot of genocide can be traced back to certain stories and ‘rumors,’ as well as conspiracy theories.

opengraph.title: News Briefs 11-01-2021 - The Daily Grail
